prompts.title: Realistic Portrait
prompts.prompt: Ultra-realistic portrait of a South Asian woman in soft natural light, 85mm lens, bokeh background, subtle makeup, cinematic color grading.
prompts.expected_image: A detailed human portrait with shallow depth of field and soft lighting.

prompts.title: Tokyo Night Street
prompts.prompt: Rainy Tokyo street at night, neon reflections on wet pavement, crowd with umbrellas, captured with a 35mm lens.
prompts.expected_image: Night street with neon cyberpunk aesthetic and reflections.

prompts.title: Sushi Table Shot
prompts.prompt: Top-down shot of a wooden table with a sushi platter, natural diffuse lighting, shallow depth of field, crisp textures.
prompts.expected_image: Professional food photography setup with sushi platter.

prompts.title: Red Dragon Fantasy
prompts.prompt: Gigantic red dragon perched on a cliff during sunset, hyper-detailed scales, cinematic lighting, fantasy artwork.
prompts.expected_image: Epic dragon in a fantasy sunset environment.

prompts.title: Sci-Fi Space Station
prompts.prompt: Futuristic space station corridor illuminated with blue LED strips, metallic textures, astronauts walking.

prompts.title: Enchanted Forest
prompts.prompt: Enchanted forest with glowing mushrooms, floating magical particles, teal-purple color palette, fantasy matte painting.

prompts.title: Headphone Product Render
prompts.prompt: Matte-black wireless headphone floating above a white background, soft shadow, studio lighting.

prompts.title: Luxury Perfume Shot
prompts.prompt: Luxury perfume bottle on reflective marble surface, golden ambient lighting, elegant composition.

prompts.title: Golden Hour Mountains
prompts.prompt: Snow-covered mountain range during golden hour, soft orange glow hitting the peaks, ultra-wide shot.

prompts.title: Tropical Sunrise Beach
prompts.prompt: Tropical beach with turquoise water, palm trees, colorful sunrise sky, captured in 4K UHD.
